jam.sort.stream
Class L00XInputStream

java.lang.Object
  jam.sort.stream.EventInputStream
      jam.sort.stream.L002HeaderReader
          jam.sort.stream.L00XInputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
L002Parameters
public class L00XInputStream
extends L002HeaderReader
implements L002Parameters

This class knows how to handle Oak Ridge tape format. It extends EventInputStream, adding methods for reading events and returning them as int arrays which the sorter can handle.

Since:
JDK1.1
Version:
0.5 April 98
Author:
Dale Visser, Ken Swartz
See Also:
EventInputStream

Method Detail

readEvent

public EventInputStatus readEvent(int[] input)
                           throws EventException
Reads an event from the input stream Expects the stream position to be the beginning of an event. It is up to the user to ensure this.

Specified by:
readEvent in class EventInputStream
Parameters:
input - source of event data
Returns:
status after attempt to read an event
Throws:
